channel.title: [562] IPBan, Mute & Ban System not working [562]
channel.description:
Hello,
I've been developing a 562 server the original name for it was corruption x. But i've changed alot of things like the ::home and more... I am hosting it and have friendly players playing. 1 Day i've had a spammer coming in to the server. I've muted him, he still could talk, I banned him he got forced to log out. He was banned but could log back in, Then i tryed IP Ban and the same thing happened. I developed my own Jail command which locked him into a room where he couldnt get out.
Since then i had alot of spammers advetising on my server and more, Jailing them wasn't enough they just kept making accounts, So i closed the server.
I want to fix the server, I've been looking for help on rune locus and on rune server. But i could never find my topics because their forums are that bad that they dont have the "Show new replies to your posts." button. So i decided to ask people here.
Does anyone know a good tutorial? or can help me out? Please help me the MS Community. I've been trying to fix this for 3 months but nothing ever has worked. :(
Thanks,
Sam.
